itemDescription: British Army officer of the Second World War

wikipedia_page.main: Denis Sheldon McGregor Eadie MC (12 February 1917 - 28 March 2015) was a British Army officer of the Second World War who was awarded the Military Cross by Field Marshal Lord Wavell for his conduct during the relief of Kohima.

response: * 12 February – Denis Eadie, Scottish World War II army officer and Military cross recipient (died 2015)
*Denis Eadie MC, British Army officer who was awarded the Military Cross by Field Marshal Lord Wavell for his conduct during the relief of Kohima during the Second World War
*Denis Eadie, 98, British WWII army officer and Military Cross recipient.Obituary Denis Sheldon McGregor Eadie MC
